Nina Ricci Ricci Deodorant Spray - 150 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1190

She is as pretty as the her flowers and as fresh as their fluting aromas. For the woman who relishes the soothing comfort of the floral carpets noted designer Nina Ricci presents Ricci Deo Spray from the fragrance line that adorns the sophisticated urbane Parisienne. Made for the woman who can appreciate the delicate plait of elements the deodorant spray is refreshing and succulent. The luxury fragrance strikes the right balance between the delicately feminine and the invigorating freshness. Ricci Deo Spray comes in a simple pretty can which is white printed with pink ribbons that grace the whole range. Celebrate the bold audaciousness and optimism with the elegance of Nina Ricci Ricci Deo Spray.
